overview:
Donald F. Logan is Chief Operating Officer at Enginuity PLM â€“ bringing strategic, tactical, and operations management to head up the design, operation, and improvement of corporate systems. He brings over 30 years experience in building software and technology based companies.

Don has served in executive capacities for enterprise, supply chain management, and application software companies in the US and abroad in a host of industries. Most recently, he was a contract-based Chief Operating Officer for SmartEquip, Inc., a parts and services solutions provider for heavy construction equipment markets.
